Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.PlayerState

Class PlayerState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.PlayerState.PlayerState
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerStateSelecting, PlayerStateWaiting
public abstract class PlayerState extends Object
This class represents the state of a player during the game.

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      tilesSelection - the tilesSelection to check
      Returns:

    • isSelectionValid

      protected Boolean isSelectionValid(ArrayList<Coordinates> tilesSelection, Board board) throws VoidBoardTileException
      Checks if the selection is valid.
      Parameters:
      tilesSelection - the tilesSelection to check
      board - the game board
      Returns:
      true if and only if the selection is valid
      Throws:
      VoidBoardTileException - if a tile on the board is null

    • isColumnValid

      protected Boolean isColumnValid(int pickLen, int column, Bookshelf bookshelf)
      Checks if the column in the bookshelf is valid for inserting the pick.
      Parameters:
      pickLen - the length of the pick
      column - the column in the bookshelf
      bookshelf - the bookshelf
      Returns:
      true if and only if the column is valid for inserting the pick

    • pickAndInsertInBookshelf

      public abstract void pickAndInsertInBookshelf(ArrayList<Coordinates> tilesSelection, Board board, Bookshelf bookshelf, int column, int[] order) throws PlayerIsWaitingException, SelectionIsEmptyException, SelectionNotValidException, ColumnNotValidException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, PickDoesntFitColumnException, TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException, VoidBoardTileException
      Abstract method for picking and inserting tiles into the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      tilesSelection - the tilesSelection to pick and insert
      board - the game board
      bookshelf - the bookshelf
      column - the column in the bookshelf
      order - the order of insertion
      Throws:
      PlayerIsWaitingException - if the player is waiting
      SelectionIsEmptyException - if the selection is empty
      SelectionNotValidException - if the selection is not valid
      ColumnNotValidException - if the column is not valid
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the picked column is out of bounds
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the pick doesn't fit the column
      TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException - if the size of the tilesSelection is different from the length of the order
      VoidBoardTileException - if a tile on the board is null

    • insertPickInBookShelf

      public abstract void insertPickInBookShelf(ArrayList<Item> pickedItems, Bookshelf bookshelf, int column, int[] order) throws ColumnNotValidException, PlayerIsWaitingException, PickDoesntFitColumnException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException
      Abstract method for inserting a pick into the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      pickedItems - the items picked
      bookshelf - the bookshelf
      column - the column in the bookshelf
      order - the order of insertion
      Throws:
      ColumnNotValidException - if the column is not valid
      PlayerIsWaitingException - if the player is waiting
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the pick doesn't fit the column
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the picked column is out of bounds
